ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: is the food of the wicked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: shall be the food of the sinful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Is the food of the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Will be the food of the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is the food of the sinful
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: is the food of the guilty,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: shall be food for the sinners:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: will be the food of the sinful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Will be the food of the Sinful,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Will be the food of the sinners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: shall be the food of the guilty sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:44] will be the food of the sinful, Abū Jahl and his companions, the gravest of sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The food of the sinner) the tree of Zaqqum is the food of the sinner, Abu Jahl and his host, in the Fire!
